titleStmt.title: The stratagems of Ierusalem vvith the martiall lavves and militarie discipline, as well of the Iewes, as of the Gentiles. By Lodowick LLoyd Esquier, one of her Maiesties serieants at armes.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.

notesStmt.note: With seven final contents leaves; the last leaf is blank.
Variant: with a Latin quotation above device on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
